text:
@realDonaldTrump You are killing U.S.

You FIRED the Pandemic Team because Obama created it.

If they were in place we wouldn't be in this mess.

How many will die under YOUR watch?

You LIE to the American People.

#MAGA ???

Letting Americans DIE???

#COVID19
